text: The Bandit of Tacca Del Lupo () is a 1952 Italian historical drama film directed by Pietro Germi. == Cast == *Amedeo Nazzari as Giordani, Bersaglieri Captain *Cosetta Greco as Zitamaria *Saro Urzì as Police Commissioner Francesco Siceli *Fausto Tozzi as Lt. Magistrelli *Aldo Bufi Landi as Lt. Righi *Vincenzo Musolino as Carmine *Oreste Romoli as Raffa Raffa *Oscar Andriani as The General *Alfredo Bini as De Giustino *Amedeo Trilli as Sgt. Trilli ==References== ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:1950s historical drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian historical drama films Category:Films directed by Pietro Germi Category:Films scored by Carlo Rustichelli Category:Films set in Basilicata Category:Films set in the 19th century Category:Biographical films about Italian bandits Category:1952 drama films
title: The Bandit of Tacca Del Lupo
